audioText: Tu croiras tout ce que racontent les médias sur cette affaire politique?
question: What will the person believe according to the speaker?
options: Everything the media says about this political matter
What their friends tell them about politics
explanation: The text states 'Tu croiras tout ce que racontent les médias sur cette affaire politique?' - Will you believe everything the media says about this political matter? 'Croiras' is the second person singular future tense of 'croire' (to believe), expressing doubt about future belief.
